name: databricksDeployDBFSFilesTask
description: Deploy files (py, jar, csv etc) to DBFS
author: Data Thirst Ltd

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Databricks bearer token
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key - see your user account in your Databricks Workspace

inputs.name: region
inputs.label: Azure Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of your workspace as seen in workspace URL

inputs.name: LocalRootFolder
inputs.label: Local Root Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder to deploy for example $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/drop

inputs.name: FilePattern
inputs.label: File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File Pattern to match, example *.jar or MyFile.csv

inputs.name: TargetLocation
inputs.label: Target folder in DBFS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder in DBFS, should start /, example /Folder/Subfolder
